医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
免疫检查点抑制剂的综合分析揭示内分泌毒性模式宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。免疫检查点抑制剂（ICIs）彻底改变了癌症治疗，但也带来了免疫相关不良事件（irAE）的挑战，特别是内分泌毒性，可能严重损害患者的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Compliance-analysis-of-immune-checkpoint-inhibitors-reveals-endocrine-毒性-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Compliance-analysis-of-immune-checkpoint-inhibitors-reveals-endocrine-毒性-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7afe0073-567b-4780-8fe5-4a353d6c3a2c Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:30:14 -0500 Comprehensive analysis of immune checkpoint inhibitors reveals endocrine toxicity patterns
研究揭示了 COVID-19 政策下学生入学趋势的种族差异在 2020 年秋季 COVID-19 大流行期间提供面授学校的学区中，非白人学生的入学率下降幅度大于白人学生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-racial-disparities-in-student-enrollment-trends-amid-COVID-19-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-racial-disparities-in-student-enrollment-trends-amid-COVID-19-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36476313-3932-4a76-8b2b-7d9b0ba14c5e Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:26:48 -0500 Study reveals racial disparities in student enrollment trends amid COVID-19 policies
分子内二价胶：蛋白质降解的一个有前途的途径活细胞类似于高度组织化的小镇——除了能源生产、运输系统和建筑之外，细胞还需要高效的废物处理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Intramolecular-bivalent-glues-A-promising-avenue-for- Protein-degradation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Intramolecular-bivalent-glues-A-promising-avenue-for- Protein-degradation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2f9dcbd-bd9c-4d70-9e44-00a6bcb13e6e Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:19:00 -0500 Intramolecular bivalent glues: A promising avenue for protein degradation
数字 DNA 熔解分析可以成为更快、更可靠的病原体检测工具一种新的分析方法可以比血培养更快、更准确地检测血液样本中的病原体，血培养是感染诊断的最新技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Digital-DNA-melting-analysis-can-be-a-faster-and-more-reliable-tool-for-pathogen-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Digital-DNA-melting-analysis-can-be-a-faster-and-more-reliable-tool-for-pathogen-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d0d7618-8958-466b-9167-5a500b768b18 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:15:00 -0500 Digital DNA melting analysis can be a faster and more reliable tool for pathogen detection
研究显示普通人群中持续感染 COVID-19 的比例很高牛津大学领导的一项新研究发现，普通人群中很大一部分 SARS-CoV-2 感染会导致持续一个月或更长时间的持续感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-persistent-COVID-19-infections-in-general-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-persistent-COVID-19-infections-in-general-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2193e428-16b6-457f-bf20-9bdf5bf92db6 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:08:52 -0500 Study reveals high prevalence of persistent COVID-19 infections in general population
研究确定了老年女性预防心力衰竭的最佳每日步骤科学明确表明，随着年龄的增长，运动对我们的身体有益。但到底多少体力活动对 60 岁以上的人有益呢？布法罗大学的一项新研究提供了答案，并不是每天走一万步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-identizes-optimal-daily-steps-for-heart-failure-prevention-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-identizes-optimal-daily-steps-for-heart-failure-prevention-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a394cfe5-b6db-4420-94ef-92cdaac4f839 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:57:24 -0500 Study identifies optimal daily steps for heart failure prevention in older women
模仿禁食的饮食周期可以减少免疫系统衰老的迹象，以及胰岛素抵抗和肝脏脂肪最近的一项研究表明，成人三个周期的模拟禁食饮食与较低的糖尿病前期标志物、较低的肝脂肪和较高的淋巴与骨髓比率有关，这是免疫系统老化的指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Cycles-of-a-diet-that-mimics-fasting-can-reduce-signs-of-immune-system-aging-as-well-as-胰岛素抵抗和肝脂肪.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Cycles-of-a-diet-that-mimics-fasting-can-reduce-signs-of-immune-system-aging-as-well-as-胰岛素抵抗和肝脂肪.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c9df52-88f0-4e0e-a89f-23f5d6e740c7 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:52:00 -0500 Cycles of a diet that mimics fasting can reduce signs of immune system aging, as well as insulin resistance and liver fat
孕产妇精神疾病：导致新妈妈死亡的一个未被充分认识的因素由国家儿童医院领导的一个研究小组描绘了一幅发人深省的画面，他们收集了多年的数据，表明孕产妇精神疾病是导致新妈妈死亡的一个未被充分认识的因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Maternal-mental-illness-An-under-recognized-contributor-to-the-mortality-of-new-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Maternal-mental-illness-An-under-recognized-contributor-to-the-mortality-of-new-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d00e6fd-6bd6-4eea-bf70-3ac092c62d40 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:49:43 -0500 Maternal mental illness: An under-recognized contributor to the mortality of new mothers
神经胶质瘤进展的突破性研究荣获 BIAL 生物医学奖来自德国、美国、英国和挪威的研究团队荣获第三届 BIAL 生物医学奖，这是由 BIAL 基金会颁发的 30 万欧元奖金，旨在表彰具有卓越质量和科学相关性的生物医学工作近十年出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Breakthrough-research-on-glioma-progression-wins-BIAL-Award-in-Biomedicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Breakthrough-research-on-glioma-progression-wins-BIAL-Award-in-Biomedicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7511b30-9b9a-48bb-a35e-e40cb97f6207 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:46:00 -0500 Breakthrough research on glioma progression wins BIAL Award in Biomedicine
美国肝细胞癌发病率和死亡率上升：综合分析在过去的二十年里，美国原发性肝癌的发病率显着增加，其中男性的发病率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Rising-incidence-and-mortality-rate-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma-in-the-USA-A-compressive-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Rising-incidence-and-mortality-rate-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma-in-the-USA-A-compressive-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f95bc42-1547-422a-994c-caccba01ea85 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:44:28 -0500 Rising incidence and mortality rate of hepatocellular carcinoma in the USA: A comprehensive analysis
